cgcloud__Order_Item__c.name: cgcloud__Order_Item__c
cgcloud__Order_Item__c.description: Stores the details of the order item object.

cgcloud__Base_Price_Receipt__c.description: Basic product price in receipt currency.

cgcloud__Base_Price__c.description: Stores the Value of the item, specified in the appropriate product condition.

cgcloud__Check_In_Reason_Code__c.description: Allows the specification of a reason if the checked-in product quantity doesn't adhere to the expected product quantity that's given via product inventory.

cgcloud__Consumer_Quantity__c.description: Ordered quantity expressed in consumer quantity units.

cgcloud__Discount__c.description: Manual discount given by the user.

cgcloud__Erp_Id__c.description: ID of this order entry for the ERP system.

cgcloud__Free_Item_Creation_Step__c.description: Stores a reference to the step that generates the free item.

cgcloud__History__c.description: The item, which has been added to the disposal list, has been ordered in a former sales document. (The item belongs to a former sales document of the same business partner and of the same sales document template.)

cgcloud__Left_Quantity__c.description: Item quantity that's left on the truck after product check-in.

cgcloud__Listed__c.description: Indicates whether the product exists in an authorization list of the order.

cgcloud__Modification_Reason__c.description: Specifies a reason if preordered product quantity has been modified on the mobility device.

cgcloud__Order_Item_Template__c.description: ID of the order item template with which the Order Item is associated.

cgcloud__Order__c.description: ID of the order with which the Order Item is associated.

cgcloud__Out_Of_Stock__c.description: Specifies whether the product is out of stock.

cgcloud__Parent_Order_Item__c.description: Reference to a parent Order Item. (For example, for a free item, the ordered item that caused the free item. It's used in complex pricing on mobility devices.

cgcloud__Parent_Type__c.description: Defines the parent to which the free item is related. It can be related to an Order Item. If the free item related to the Order header type is Order, then Parent_Order_Item is filled.

cgcloud__Price_Receipt__c.description: Calculated price of the item in the receipt or document currency.

cgcloud__Price__c.description: Calculated price of the item in the domestic currency.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_1__c.description: Additional pricing information field that stores the calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_2__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_3__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_4__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_5__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_6__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_7__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_8__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_9__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Info_10__c.description: Additional pricing information field for storing calculated value in the Order Item level.

cgcloud__Pricing_Information__c.description: Stores conditions that were used to calculate pricing.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Product ID of the selected product.

cgcloud__Promoted__c.description: Indicates whether a promotion is available in the relevant period.

cgcloud__Promotion_Reward__c.description: Reference to the reward that belongs to the Order Item.

cgcloud__Promotion__c.description: Reference to the promotion if the product of the item originates from a selectable promotion.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Hyperlink to the detail page of the record.

cgcloud__Special_Price_Receipt__c.description: Specifies a reduced price for an item that's used to calculate the item value, if specified. This attribute can be edited only if the Order item template allows the consideration of the special price.

cgcloud__Special_Price__c.description: Specifies a reduced price for an item that's used to calculate the item value, if specified. This attribute can be edited only if the sales document item template allows the consideration of the special price.

cgcloud__Suggested_Quantity__c.description: Contains the suggested order quantity that's been calculated via an algorithm or that's given by a relevant promotion.

cgcloud__Target_Quantity__c.description: Product checkout quantity for the tour that the HOST interface specifies.

cgcloud__Value_Receipt__c.description: Calculated value of the item in the receipt or document currency.

cgcloud__Value__c.description: Calculated value of the item in the domestic currency.

cgcloud__Voided__c.description: Indicates whether a disposal list item is voided.
